title: Getting Started with React
summary: A quick introduction to React and how it works.
content: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces...

title: Understanding React Router
summary: Learn how routing works in React apps.
content: React Router helps you navigate between components easily...

title: State Management with Redux
summary: Manage your application state efficiently using Redux.
content: Redux is a predictable state container for JavaScript apps. It helps you write applications that behave consistently across different environments and are easy to test.

title: Styling in React
summary: Explore different methods to style React components.
content: You can style React components using CSS modules, styled-components, or traditional CSS. Choosing the right method depends on the complexity and scalability of your project.

title: Yeet
summary: A step-by-step guide to deploying your React app.
content: React apps can be deployed using platforms like Vercel, Netlify, or GitHub Pages. This guide walks you through building your app and pushing it live.
